name: Don't give up (itch) (LazyGelatin)
description:
This was developed as a homework project for Level Designer's Computer Technology class during his trade school time few years ago.

 
I, who helped him on this project as a programmer during my downtime at work (mostly for free), just found this in my cloud recently.

And I think that it would be wasted to left it to rot there.

So I decided to put this less than a week game project here just for the sake of laugh.

50% of donation will goes to the Level Designer guy who still unemployed, to support him during this hopeless time (If you lived in Thailand, you know what I mean.).
